notes: Full role simulation for Manager (Sales) on FM v1.0.2. Significant UX improvements vs v1.0.1: 4/4 CRITICAL issues RESOLVED (progress visibility, info panel, price correction process, action notifications). Remaining: 3 HIGH (no SLA countdown, auto-approval limit 1000r/day, emergency limit 5/month in peaks) + 2 MEDIUM. Overall UX improvement: ~60%. Economy: ~30 min/day per manager vs v1.0.1.
